title: The U.S. Gave Mexico a List of Russian Spies. Mexico Let Them Stay.
abstract: Moscow has ramped up covert operations in Mexico, with spies meeting handlers in its bustling capital and seaside resorts, U.S. officials say.

multimedia.caption: The Russian Embassy in Mexico City is one of Moscow’s largest around the world, according to its Foreign Ministry, although the Kremlin and Mexico have few economic, cultural or military ties.
multimedia.copyright: Marian Carrasquero for The New York Times
